title: All issues list: filter by status and priority, search, and open an issue
description: Verifies that a user can filter and search the issues list and open an issue detail view from the results.

steps.description: Filter issues by status (open, in_progress, done, etc.)
Filter issues by priority (high, medium, low)

title: All issues list: open issue details from the filtered results
description: Verifies that clicking an issue card from the list opens its details view.

steps.description: Click on issue card to view details

title: Create issue: successful creation shows new issue in list
description: Verifies a user can create a new issue via the create dialog and see it appear in the all issues list.

steps.description: Click create issue button to open dialog
Fill issue details (title, description, status, priority)

title: Issue details: add a comment and see it in activity history
description: Verifies a user can add a comment on an issue and see it appear in the issue activity history.

steps.description: Click on issue card to view details
Verify element "Issue activity history" is visible

title: Issue details: comment is visible after posting
description: Verifies that a newly added comment is visible in the activity/history feed on the issue details view.

steps.description: Click on issue card to view details

title: Create issue: validation error when title is omitted
description: Verifies the create issue form enforces required fields and shows validation errors when title is missing.

steps.description: Click create issue button to open dialog

title: Create issue: validation message is shown and issue is not created
description: Verifies that submission without a title shows a visible validation message and does not add a new issue to the list.

steps.description: Click create issue button to open dialog

title: Create issue: show error message on create failure and do not create issue
description: Verifies that if issue creation fails, a visible error message is shown and the issue is not added to the list.

steps.description: Click create issue button to open dialog
Fill issue details (title, description, status, priority)

title: Issue details: update status and priority from issue view
description: Verifies a user can update an issue's status and priority from the issue details view and see the updated values displayed.

steps.description: Click on issue card to view details
Verify element "Issue activity history" is visible

title: Create a new project from Projects list and verify it appears
description: Creates a project via the create dialog and confirms the new project is visible in the projects list.

steps.description: Click the "Projects" item in the main navigation
Click the "Create project" button to open the dialog
Fill "E2E Project Alpha" into the project name field
Fill "Project created by automated UI test" into the project description field
Select a team from the team dropdown
Click the "Create" or "Submit" button in the dialog
Verify text "E2E Project Alpha" is visible

title: Filter projects by team and verify only matching projects are shown
description: Uses the team filter to narrow the projects list and verifies the filter state is reflected on the page.

steps.description: Click the "Projects" item in the main navigation
Select a team from the team filter dropdown
Verify the selected team name is visible in the team filter control

title: Open a project details page from a project card
description: Navigates from the projects list into a specific project details page by clicking a project card.

steps.description: Click the "Projects" item in the main navigation
Click on the first visible project card

title: Switch between project tabs (Features, Updates, Resources)
description: Verifies the project detail view supports switching between major tabs and each tab displays its content area.

steps.description: Click the "Projects" item in the main navigation
Click on the first visible project card

title: Create a project update with a health status
description: Adds a new update on a project and verifies the update appears in the Updates tab.

steps.description: Click the "Projects" item in the main navigation
Click on the first visible project card
Click the "Create update" or "New update" button
Select "Green" from the health status dropdown
Fill "Weekly status update from E2E test" into the update text field
Verify text "Weekly status update from E2E test" is visible

title: Add a comment to an existing project update
description: Adds a comment to a project update and verifies the comment is displayed under the update.

steps.description: Click the "Projects" item in the main navigation
Click on the first visible project card
Scroll to the first visible update
Click the comment input field for the first visible update
Type "Comment added by E2E test" into the comment input field
Verify text "Comment added by E2E test" is visible

title: Create project validation error when name is missing
description: Attempts to create a project without a name and verifies a visible validation error is shown and the project is not created.

steps.description: Click the "Projects" item in the main navigation
Click the "Create project" button to open the dialog
Fill "" into the project name field
Fill "Missing name should fail" into the project description field
Select a team from the team dropdown
Click the "Create" or "Submit" button in the dialog

title: Attempt to access project settings without permission and verify access denied behavior
description: From a project detail view, attempts to open project settings and verifies an access denied message or redirection occurs.

steps.description: Click the "Projects" item in the main navigation
Click on the first visible project card
Click the "Settings" button or "Project settings" option if visible

title: View Features Kanban board after login
description: Verifies an authenticated user can open the Features page and see the kanban board columns by status.

title: Open a feature and update status and priority
description: Verifies a user can open feature details and update status and priority, and the card appears in the expected column.

steps.description: Click on a feature card in the kanban board

title: Update priority in feature details and see it reflected
description: Verifies changing a feature's priority from its details persists visually in the feature window or card.

steps.description: Click on a feature card in the kanban board

title: Create a new feature and verify it appears in Backlog
description: Verifies a user can create a new feature via the feature form and see it added to the backlog column.

steps.description: Type "E2E Test Feature" into the "Title" field

title: View linked issues from a feature details window
description: Verifies a user can open a feature and see a linked issues section with visible issue entries (if present).

steps.description: Click on a feature card in the kanban board
Verify element "Linked issues list" is visible

title: Create a milestone for a feature and verify it appears
description: Verifies a user can add a milestone to a feature and see it listed in the feature details.

steps.description: Click on a feature card in the kanban board

title: Generate blueprint and view recommended features from a new idea
description: Verifies a user can submit an idea, receive AI suggestions, generate a blueprint, and see recommended features.

steps.description: Click on "AI Generator" in the main navigation

title: Submit idea with name and description and receive AI suggestions
description: Verifies idea submission captures required fields and returns AI suggestions on the AI Generator page.

steps.description: Click on "AI Generator" in the main navigation
Type "Smart Habit Tracker" into the idea name field
Type "An app that helps users build habits using reminders, streaks, and AI-generated coaching." into the idea description field
Click the "Submit" or "Generate" button for the idea

title: Answer validation questions before generating project documents
description: Verifies validation questions can be answered and then project documents (e.g., PRD, App Flow) are generated and visible for editing.

steps.description: Click on "AI Generator" in the main navigation
Type "Team Meeting Notes Summarizer" into the idea name field
Type "A web app that summarizes meeting notes and extracts action items for teams." into the idea description field
Click the "Submit" or "Generate" button for the idea
Click an answer option for the first visible validation question

title: Generate PRD and open it for editing
description: Verifies generated documents list includes PRD and it can be opened into an editor view.

steps.description: Click on "AI Generator" in the main navigation
Type "Personal Finance Coach" into the idea name field
Type "An app that helps users budget, forecast expenses, and get personalized recommendations." into the idea description field
Click the "Submit" or "Generate" button for the idea

title: Upload documents for analysis shows supported upload UI (without performing OS file dialog)
description: Verifies the AI Generator provides a visible entry point to upload documents for analysis (without interacting with native file pickers).

steps.description: Click on "AI Generator" in the main navigation

title: Sync blueprint from documents section displays linked blueprint area
description: Verifies the documents analysis flow exposes an option to sync blueprint from docs and shows a linked blueprint section once sync is initiated.

steps.description: Click on "AI Generator" in the main navigation
Click the "Upload documents" or "Documents" section tab

title: Generate project documents from synced blueprint shows artifacts list
description: Verifies that after initiating blueprint sync from docs, the user can generate project documents and see generated artifacts listed.

steps.description: Click on "AI Generator" in the main navigation
Click the "Upload documents" or "Documents" section tab

title: Required fields validation for idea submission
description: Verifies the idea submission form blocks submission and shows validation messaging when required fields are missing.

steps.description: Click on "AI Generator" in the main navigation
Click the "Submit" or "Generate" button for the idea

title: Sidebar navigation from All Issues to Inbox
description: Verifies the app redirects to All Issues after landing on root and that the sidebar can navigate to Inbox.

title: User menu opens from global header and shows logout option
description: Verifies the global user menu dropdown can be opened and contains a visible logout action.

steps.description: Click the user avatar/name in the header
Verify element "Logout" is visible in the user menu

title: Logout from user menu redirects to login
description: Verifies logging out from the global user menu returns the user to the login page.

steps.description: Click the user avatar/name in the header

title: Navigate from All Issues to My Issues via sidebar
description: Verifies a second sidebar route change works end-to-end and the destination page renders.

steps.description: Click "My Issues" in the sidebar menu

title: Navigate to Settings via sidebar and confirm page loads
description: Verifies the sidebar can navigate to Settings and the Settings page is visible.

title: Update user profile from Profile tab and see success confirmation
description: Verifies a logged-in user can update profile name and email from Settings and sees a visible success confirmation with updated values shown.

steps.description: Click on "Settings" in the main navigation
Fill "Updated Test User" into the Name field

title: Switch between Profile and Organization tabs in Settings
description: Verifies Settings tabs are navigable and each tab shows its expected visible content area.

steps.description: Click on "Settings" in the main navigation

title: View organization details in Settings Organization tab
description: Verifies the organization details section is visible and populated on the Organization tab.

steps.description: Click on "Settings" in the main navigation
Verify an element "Organization details" is visible
